definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: move to and fro, wander, flutter, shew grief (NH id. (rare); Aram. nod [[נוּד]], shake, move to and fro, be disturbed, agitated; BAram. flee (v. infr.); Ar. (nwd)na0da waver, totter);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נׇד]] so rd. for MT [[נֵד]] Is 17:11 Ges Hi Ew Di Kit Che:Hpt RV; 3 pl. [[נָ֫דוּ]] Je 50:3; Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇנוּד]] 1Ki 14:15 + 3 t.; 2 ms. [[תָּנוּד]] Je 4:1 juss. [[תָּנׁד]] Je 16:5; 3 mpl. [[וַיׇּנֻ֫דוּ]] Job 42:11; 2 mpl. [[תָּנֻ֫דוּ]] Je 22:10; Imv. fs. [[פָנ֫וּדִי]] Ps 11:1 Qr (Kt [[נודו]]); mpl. [[נֻ֫דוּ]] Je 48:l7 + 2 t. Je; Inf. [[לָנוּד]] Job 2:11 + 2 t.; Pt. [[נׇד]] Ge 4:12, Ge 4:14; —

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: move to and fro, wander aimlessly, as fugitive, [[נׇע וׇנׇד]] Ge 4:12, Ge 4:14 (J), Je 4:1 (Gie, as apod., so RV; but Ew Hi Gf Che Ke, as prot., if thou wanderest not [morally], and swearest, etc.,—Ew Hi reading with LXX [[שׁקוחיך]] [[מִפִּי ְוּמִפָּנַי לא תנוד]]; Co del. v:1; v:2); take flight (perh. metaplast. form of [[נדד]] q. v.), [[נֻסוּ נֻּדוּ מְאׂד]] Je 49:30 (on dagh. v. Ges:§ 20 g), of harvest Is 17:1l i.e. be destroyed, in fig. (v. supr.); Je 50:3 (‖[[הלך]]), v:Je 50:8 (sq. [[מִתּוֹךְ]]; ‖[[יחא]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: flutter, of bird Pr 26:2 (‖[[עוּף]]); fig. of soul Ps 11:1.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: waver, wave, shake, of reed 1Ki 14:15 (sim. of smitten Isr.).
shew grief (i. e. by shaking or nodding head), usu. sq. [[ל]] pers.:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lament for the dead (Josiah) Je 22:10 (‖[[בכה]]), for Jerus. Je 15:5 (‖[[חמל]]), Je 16:5 (‖[[ספד]]), Is 51:19; for Nineveh Na 3:7; Moab Je 48:l7.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: condole, shew sympathy with Job 2:11, Job 42:11; abs. Ps 69:21.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇנִיד]] Je 18:16; 3 fs. sf. [[תְּנִדֵנִי]] Ps 36:12; Imv. ms. sf. [[הֲנִידֵָמוֹ]] Ps 59:12 (so rd. for MT [[הורידמו]] SyrVer Lag:Proph. Chald, xlviii. Dr:2Sa 15:20 cf. Che:crit. n. Hup-Now Bae Du); Inf. [[לְהָנִיד]] 2Ki 21:8; —
cause to wander aimlessly, as fugitives, c. acc. pers. Ps 36:12, Ps 59:12 (v. supr.), sq. [[רֶגֶל]] 2Ki 21:8.
make a wagging, wag with the head, [[בְּראׁשׁ]] Je 18:16.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[כְּקוֹץ מֻנַׇד]] 2Sa 23:6 and the worthless, like briers made to flutter (tossed away) are they (text dub.; Klo Bu HPS rd. [[מדבר]]).

definitions.title: Hithpoïlel
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[וְהִתְנוֹדֲדָה]] consec. Is 24:20; Impf. 2 ms. [[תִּתְנוֹדָָד]] Je 48:27; Pt. [[מִתְנוֹדֵד]] Je 31:18; —
move oneself to and fro, sway, totter, Is 24:20 (of earth).
shake oneself, in excitement Je 48:27 (perh. of scorn = wag the head, as Hiph. Je 18:16 cf. Gf RV).

definitions.title: Qal 2
definitions.body: ), Je 31:18 (the lament follows in orat. recta).
